title: Women's Pullover Sweater Dress Long Lantern Sleeve Turtle Neck Cute Ribbed Knit Bodycon Mini Short Dress 2024 Fall
description: Material: This ribbed knit sweater dress is made of super soft, breathable, and comfortable fabric. It is highly stretchy and lightweight, better embracing your curves for every body type

Design: A must-have basic sexy turtleneck mini sweater dress featuring ribbed knit,drop shoulder,lantern long sleeves, above-knee length, ruched design on both sides, and an elastic band at the waist that accentuates the slimming effect on the lower half. It hugs your body perfectly to show your femininity.

Occasions: This elegant and dressy sweater dress is perfect for spring, autumn, and winter. It is suitable for various occasions, including casual outings, parties, club nights, cocktail events, beach gatherings, weddings, holidays, vacations, date nights, and everyday wear.

Match: This cute sweater dress is extremely versatile. It can be paired with knee-high boots, ankle boots,stockings,leggings,jackets, statement jewelry, handbags, scarves, high heels, flats, sandals, and more. Your unique sense of style is sure to receive compliments from your friends
Style:Trendy sweater mini dress,casual dress,evening dress,club dress,skims dress,cocktail dress,vacation dresses,party dress,ladies dresses.
